item.title: Slack for Video
item.description: Slack for Video Mission Empower creators & athletes for a more video-first chat workspace Problem Modern-day work chat (Slack, Microsoft Teams) is centered around text 5G should enable users a more video-centered interface Difficult to communicate around video-first propositions Solution A cutting-edge solution for video-first creators Editing, marking made easily directly on video Have a more user-friendly yet exciting work experience
